How Afrozon Works

A simple, transparent 7-step process from search to delivery. We handle the complexity so you can focus on choosing your dream car.

01

Search & Select

Browse our verified vehicle listings from licensed US sources. Filter by make, model, year, price, and more to find your perfect vehicle.

  • Access thousands of verified US vehicles
  • Real-time pricing from licensed APIs
  • Detailed vehicle specifications and photos
  • VIN-based history information
02

Request & Quote

Submit a request for your chosen vehicle. Our team reviews availability and sends you a detailed quote with all costs broken down.

  • Complete cost breakdown included
  • All fees transparent upfront
  • Shipping options explained
  • Timeline estimates provided
03

Pay Deposit

Once you approve the quote, pay a 30% deposit to secure your vehicle. Funds are held securely in escrow.

  • Multiple payment options
  • Funds protected in escrow
  • Deposit locks in your vehicle
  • Balance due before shipping
04

Inspection & Approval

We conduct a professional inspection and provide a detailed report. You review and approve before we purchase.

  • Professional 150+ point inspection
  • Full VIN history report
  • Photo documentation
  • Your approval required to proceed
05

Purchase & Export

After your approval, Afrozon purchases the vehicle on your behalf and handles all export documentation.

  • Afrozon is merchant of record
  • Complete export documentation
  • US handling and prep
  • Insurance coverage
06

Shipping

Your vehicle is shipped via your chosen method (RoRo or Container) with full tracking throughout the journey.

  • RoRo: ~45 days delivery
  • Container: ~60 days delivery
  • Real-time tracking updates
  • Marine insurance included
07

Customs & Delivery

We handle customs clearance at the Nigerian port and deliver your vehicle directly to your doorstep.

  • Complete customs handling
  • Duty and tax payment assistance
  • Port-to-door delivery
  • Final handover and documentation

Why Choose Afrozon?

We're not just a car import service. We're your trusted partner in bringing quality vehicles to Africa.

Secure & Transparent

Escrow-protected payments, clear pricing, and no hidden fees. You always know where your money goes.

Efficient Process

45-60 day delivery with real-time tracking. We optimize every step to get your car to you faster.

Expert Support

Dedicated team available to answer questions and guide you through every step of the process.

Frequently Asked Questions

How long does the entire process take?

The complete process typically takes 45-60 days from deposit to delivery, depending on shipping method. RoRo shipping is faster (~45 days) while container shipping takes longer (~60 days).

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and wallet balance. All payments are processed securely and held in escrow until appropriate milestones are reached.

Can I cancel my order?

You can cancel before Afrozon purchases the vehicle and receive a full deposit refund minus processing fees. Once the vehicle is purchased, cancellations are not possible.

What if the inspection reveals issues?

If our inspection reveals significant issues, you can decline the vehicle and receive a full deposit refund. Minor issues will be documented and you can make an informed decision.

Is my money safe?

Yes. All deposits are held in secure escrow accounts. Funds are only released after you approve the inspection report and authorize the purchase.

What documents will I receive?

You will receive the vehicle title, bill of sale, export documentation, bill of lading, customs clearance papers, and all import documentation required for registration.

Ready to Get Started?

Browse our selection of verified vehicles and start your import journey today.
